name: Samuel didn't remember
description:
1. The Story

Our little Samuel character has lost his memory. He sees himself lost in a world. Alone in this world, he must try to recover his memory but one day he found something special...

2. Tell us how your game fits the theme.

The theme of the game being "two", I was inspired by the game Portal. So the player can pass between two worlds to discover or dodge obstacles.

3. Mention any assets (with links) used in the game that was either taken from the internet or made before the jam began.

All the assets were made by myself :)

W A S D or Arrow keys -  to move
F - To use The Power
